      Get an access control list of the given user's field on the GNS server to include the guid specified in the accesser param.
      JSONArray GNSClientCommands.fieldReadArray(String guid, String field, edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.util.GuidEntry reader)
      Reads all the values for a key from the GNS server for the given guid.

      Retrieve the aliases associated with the given guid.

      Get the location of the target GUID as a JSONArray: [LONG, LAT]
      JSONArray GNSClientCommands.getLocation(String targetGuid, edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.util.GuidEntry readerGuid)
      Get the location of the target GUID as a JSONArray: [LONG, LAT]

      Return the list of guids that are members of the group.

      Return a list of the groups that the guid is a member of.
      JSONArray GNSClientCommands.select(String field, String value)
      Returns all GUIDs that have a field that contains the given value as a JSONArray containing guids.
      JSONArray GNSClientCommands.selectLookupGroupQuery(String guid)
      Look up the value of a context aware group guid using a query.
      JSONArray GNSClientCommands.selectNear(String field, JSONArray value, Double maxDistance)
      If field is a GeoSpatial field queries the GNS server and returns all the guids that have fields that are near value which is a point specified as a two element JSONArray: [LONG, LAT].
      JSONArray GNSClientCommands.selectQuery(String query)
      Selects all records that match query.
      JSONArray GNSClientCommands.selectSetupGroupQuery(edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.util.GuidEntry accountGuid, String publicKey, String query, int interval)
      Set up a context aware group guid using a query.
      JSONArray GNSClientCommands.selectWithin(String field, JSONArray value)
      If field is a GeoSpatial field queries the GNS server return all the guids that have fields that are within value which is a bounding box specified as a nested JSONArrays of paired tuples: [[LONG_UL, LAT_UL],[LONG_BR, LAT_BR]]

      JSONArray GNSClientCommands.selectNear(String field, JSONArray value, Double maxDistance)
      If field is a GeoSpatial field queries the GNS server and returns all the guids that have fields that are near value which is a point specified as a two element JSONArray: [LONG, LAT].
      static edu.umass.cs.gnscommon.packets.CommandPacket GNSCommand.selectNear(String field, JSONArray value, Double maxDistance)
      If field is a GeoSpatial field, the query searches for all GUIDs whose field is near value that is a point specified as a two element JSONArray: [LONG, LAT].
      JSONArray GNSClientCommands.selectWithin(String field, JSONArray value)
      If field is a GeoSpatial field queries the GNS server return all the guids that have fields that are within value which is a bounding box specified as a nested JSONArrays of paired tuples: [[LONG_UL, LAT_UL],[LONG_BR, LAT_BR]]
      static edu.umass.cs.gnscommon.packets.CommandPacket GNSCommand.selectWithin(String field, JSONArray value)
      If field is a GeoSpatial field, the query searches for all GUIDs that have fields that are within the bounding box specified by value as nested JSONArrays of paired tuples: [[LONG_UL, LAT_UL],[LONG_BR, LAT_BR]].
